text:
Hey Non-Smokers in otherwise higher-risk groups, FYI:
https://t.co/jeMIV6N6FA via @nytimes

Maybe we should focus on getting #smokers to #QuitSmoking ...
& focus on vaccinating people vulnerable for reasons NOT under their own control!
